Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.models

Simple geometric models for use by the library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Axis
    Model for an Axis in space.
    BoundingBox
    Bounding box implementation for use in behind-the-scenes graphics calculations.
    Box
    Box implementation of the Model class.
    GeoSphere
    A sphere implementation based on a number of latitude and longitude divisions.
    InvertedGeoSphere
    A sphere implementation based on a number of latitude and longitude divisions.
    LeftBottomQuad
    A simple quad (square) Model.
    LightSource
    Mockup class for a lightsource, currently unused.
    Line
    Model for a line in space.
    Model
    General extendible class representing a model with a VertexBufferObject.
    Quad
    A simple quad (square) Model.
    Sphere
    Sphere implementation (based on the code in the OpenGL red book) of the Model class implemented by subdivision of a regular isocahedron.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Model.VertexFormat
    The OpenGL-internal vertex format rules the vertexes in the VertexBufferObject can follow.

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.models Description

Simple geometric models for use by the library.
